_comment: Termination Tool - Signals agent completion and returns structured result.
name: return_search_result
description: Call this tool when you have successfully gathered all information from the web search or URL fetch. This signals completion and returns the final structured result.

success.description: Whether the search/fetch was successful in retrieving useful content.

title.description: Title of the page/content retrieved, or a descriptive title for search results.

url.description: The primary URL that was fetched or the most relevant URL from search results.

content.description: The main extracted content from the page. Should be clean, well-formatted text suitable for RAG processing. Include all relevant information from the page.

summary.description: A brief summary (2-3 sentences) of what the content is about.

source_urls.description: List of all source URLs that contributed to this result.

error_message.description: If success is false, describe why the search/fetch failed.
